articles.title: Foreigners needed to fill Singapore tech jobs crunch, says MAS chief - AsiaOne
articles.description: A boom in technology jobs across all sectors in Singapore and a shortage of tech workers means the country will have to rely on foreigners to fill the gap, Ravi Menon, the managing director of the Monetary Authority of Singapore said on Tuesday (May 4). Singa…

articles.title: Norway's Telenor fully writes off Myanmar unit for $782m - Nikkei Asia

articles.content: BANGKOK -- Norwegian telecommunications company Telenor on Tuesday said it has fully written off its Myanmar operations, at a charge of 6.5 billion krone ($782 million), citing the severe impact of t… [+3337 chars]

articles.title: Who's the daddy? J-pop star Ayumi Hamasaki gives birth to second child - AsiaOne

articles.title: Amid India’s coronavirus crisis, Asia’s developing nations are all at risk - South China Morning Post
articles.description: From Laos, Vietnam and Thailand in Southeast Asia to Bhutan and Nepal bordering India, countries have been reporting significant surges.
